about_the_game:
On a particularly isolated estate lies a grand mansion that serves as a haven for poor lost girls taken in as daughters by the benevolent Lady Francesca Malcatras to serve as her esteemed maids in a life of privilege.
Yet, as the high expectations and frequent disciplining weigh heavily on the loyalty of the girls, the long-held commandment of the manor is questioned; Are these walls surrounding the paradise truly there to keep her daughters safe from the world?

Accept the tender beauty of despair, pain, and love. This is MALMAID.

Features:

  • Linear Visual Novel - See the world from the eyes of Liliana Malcatras, a painfully loyal maid, who pledged to serve her Lady to the ends of the earth.
  • A Psychosexual Thriller with a queer and trans cast, consisting of 60,000 words, 4-5 hours of playtime.
  • Doomed Toxic Yuri - Experience how the overlap of sexual tension and physical conflict risks driving the sisters apart.
  • Superpowered Maids, ready to serve their master with their lives as they partake in fierce battles with mystical powers.
  • Lively animated sprites so you can see the puppy girl Panic in real time.
  • An original soundtrack that shifts from dark ambience to breakcore to elevate the atmosphere.

content_descriptors.notes: Malcatras' Maiden is a game for adult audiences only. This work contains intense themes of toxic relationships, manipulation, child abuse, regular abuse, dubiously consensual sexual acts, incestuous themes and explicit bloody acts of heavy violence, including death and murder.

detailed_description:
On a particularly isolated estate lies a grand mansion that serves as a haven for poor lost girls taken in as daughters by the benevolent Lady Francesca Malcatras to serve as her esteemed maids in a life of privilege.
Yet, as the high expectations and frequent disciplining weigh heavily on the loyalty of the girls, the long-held commandment of the manor is questioned; Are these walls surrounding the paradise truly there to keep her daughters safe from the world?

Accept the tender beauty of despair, pain, and love. This is MALMAID.

Features:

  • Linear Visual Novel - See the world from the eyes of Liliana Malcatras, a painfully loyal maid, who pledged to serve her Lady to the ends of the earth.
  • A Psychosexual Thriller with a queer and trans cast, consisting of 60,000 words, 4-5 hours of playtime.
  • Doomed Toxic Yuri - Experience how the overlap of sexual tension and physical conflict risks driving the sisters apart.
  • Superpowered Maids, ready to serve their master with their lives as they partake in fierce battles with mystical powers.
  • Lively animated sprites so you can see the puppy girl Panic in real time.
  • An original soundtrack that shifts from dark ambience to breakcore to elevate the atmosphere.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2.0 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0

name: Malcatras' Maiden

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher.
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2.0 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: MALCATRAS' MAIDEN is a toxic yuri visual novel for adults about trauma, bonds, family, and sisterhood.
